description:
- It just became even easier to find the home you’re looking for - 

Estately Flip helps people quickly sort through the hundreds of homes to find the few that pique their interest.

The Flip interface isn’t new. However, it is perfectly suited to home buying because it mirrors how people search for homes. With Flip, home buyers rate every house by tossing bad matches into the trash and saving good ones for later.

Estately for iPhone has gained remarkable traction and a large following in just six months on the app store. The app has received hundreds of 5-star reviews and great reviews from the media and home buyers alike. We are blown away by the reception. 

Home buyers who beta tested Flip are addicted. Flip is the next step in the evolution of Estately as a beautiful, powerful, and unique iPhone app for home buyers.

We hope you enjoy Flipping as much as we do.
trackCensoredName: Estately Homes for Sale - Search Real Estate, Houses, Condos & Townhouses (MLS)
trackName: Estately Homes for Sale - Search Real Estate, Houses, Condos & Townhouses (MLS)
releaseNotes:
Estately 2.5

What's new?
- Improve Location Search Suggestions
- Bug fix for list results
- Optimized for iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus
- Stability improvements for iPad
- Usability improvements

Keep the feedback coming: iphone@estately.com
